name: Touken Ranbu Warriors - Uchiban Outfit 16-piece Set
detailed_description:
Uchiban Outfits are variations of outfits from the source material "Touken Ranbu ONLINE" that can be worn into battle.
A set that allows you to obtain at a discount all 16 varieties of Uchiban Outfits.

Content:
- Uchiban Outfit "Mikazuki Munechika"
- Uchiban Outfit "Sengo Muramasa"
- Uchiban Outfit "Tonbokiri"
- Uchiban Outfit "Kasen Kanesada"
- Uchiban Outfit "Ichigo Hitofuri"
- Uchiban Outfit "Namazuo Toushiro"
- Uchiban Outfit "Hyuga Masamune"
- Uchiban Outfit "Heshikiri Hasebe"
- Uchiban Outfit "Yagen Toushiro"
- Uchiban Outfit "Tomoegata Naginata"
- Uchiban Outfit "Tsurumaru Kuninaga"
- Uchiban Outfit "Shokudaikiri Mitsutada"
- Uchiban Outfit "Okurikara"
- Uchiban Outfit "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro"
- Uchiban Outfit "Yamanbagiri Chougi"
- Uchiban Outfit "Omokage"

How to use:
Select the outfits from "Settings" - "DLC Settings" - "Change Outfits" from Honmaru.

Notes:
Uchiban Outfits can only be worn at the honmaru or during a "Replay" battle. They cannot be worn for a "Sortie" battle.
Characters wearing Uchiban Outfits will not be in an Injured State. While wearing the outfits, the Hissatsu Gauge will fill more easily.
There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
To use the content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.

short_description: All 16 varieties of Uchiban Outfits are added.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
